verses.name: Leviticus 14:42
verses.text: And they shall take other stones, and put them in the place of those stones; and he shall take other morter, and shall plaister the house.

verses.name: Leviticus 14:43
verses.text: And if the plague come again, and break out in the house, after that he hath taken away the stones, and after he hath scraped the house, and after it is plaistered;

verses.name: Leviticus 14:44
verses.text: Then the priest shall come and look, and, behold, if the plague be spread in the house, it is a fretting leprosy in the house: it is unclean.
